amendment.description: Amendment provides that Federal agency analyses regarding significant regulatory actions must include information about the effects of any private sector mandates on workers' benefits and pensions.
amendment.purpose: An amendment (numbered 136 as printed in the Congressional Record) to provide that federal agency analyses regarding significant regulatory actions must include information about the effects of any private sector mandates on workers' benefits and pensions.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Traficant amendment (A042) Agreed to by voice vote.
